captionText: Music is the universal language of mankind.
author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

captionText: Without music, life would be a mistake.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

captionText: Music gives a soul to the universe, wings to the mind, flight to the imagination, and life to everything.
author: Plato

captionText: Music is the wine that fills the cup of silence.
author: Robert Fripp

captionText: Music is the art of thinking with sounds.
author: Jules Combarieu

captionText: Music is the shorthand of emotion.
author: Leo Tolstoy

captionText: Music is the strongest form of magic.
author: Marilyn Manson

captionText: Music is like a dream. One that I cannot hear.
author: Ludwig van Beethoven

captionText: Music is the divine way to tell beautiful, poetic things to the heart.
author: Pablo Casals

captionText: Music is the strongest form of magic.
author: Marilyn Manson

captionText: Music is the only language in which you cannot say a mean or sarcastic thing.
author: John Erskine

captionText: Music is the wine that fills the cup of silence.
author: Robert Fripp

captionText: Music is like a dream. One that I cannot hear.
author: Ludwig van Beethoven
